name: Worry Time
summary: Contain your worries to a specific time of day.
instructions: Designate a specific time (e.g., 6:00 PM) for 15-20 minutes.
During the day, if a worry arises, write it down and tell yourself 'I'll think about this at worry time'.
During your scheduled time, allow yourself to worry freely and problem-solve.
When time is up, close the book on your worries until tomorrow.
